EntitlementContact.name: EntitlementContact
EntitlementContact.description: Represents a Contact eligible to receive customer support via an Entitlement.

ContactId.description: Required. ID of the Contact associated with the entitlement. Must be a valid ID.

EntitlementId.description: Required. ID of the Entitlement associated with the entitlement contact. Must be a valid ID.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

Name.description: Required. Name of the entitlement contact.
